    • Method Detail

      • initHBaseConfiguration

        public static org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration initHBaseConfiguration()
        Initializes HBase configuration. The following parameters are edited: hbase.client.retries.number = 1 - tries to connect to HBase only 2 times before failing.
        Returns:
        HBase configuration

      • isTableAvailable

        public static boolean isTableAvailable(org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.Admin hbaseAdmin,
                                       java.lang.String tableName)
                                throws java.io.IOException
        Returns if given table exists and is enabled.
        Parameters:
        hbaseAdmin - HBase admin, must be initialized
        tableName - table name
        Returns:
        true if table exists
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if a remote or network exception occurs when connecting to HBase

      • closeConnection

        public static void closeConnection(org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.Admin hbaseAdmin,
                                   org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.Connection hbaseConnection)
                            throws java.io.IOException
        Closes HBase admin and connection if they are open.
        Parameters:
        hbaseAdmin - HBase admin
        hbaseConnection - HBase connection
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs when connecting to HBase
